ruleset.name: PMD specific rules
ruleset.description: These rules check for problems that are specific to the PMD codebase and may not be applicable to other projects.

rule.name: UseInstanceOftoCompareClasses
rule.message: replace o.getClass().equals(MyClass.class) with o instanceof MyClass
rule.description: replace o.getClass().equals(MyClass.class) with o instanceof MyClass. Make sure MyClass doesn't have descendants

property.name: xpath
property.value: //PrimaryExpression[ (PrimaryPrefix[Name[ends-with(@Image, 'getClass')]] or PrimarySuffix[@Image='getClass']) and PrimarySuffix[Arguments[count(ArgumentList)=0]] and PrimarySuffix[@Image='equals'] and PrimarySuffix/Arguments/ArgumentList/Expression/PrimaryExpression/PrimaryPrefix /ResultType/Type/ReferenceType/ClassOrInterfaceType ]

rule.name: ReversedUseInstanceOftoCompareClasses
rule.message: replace MyClass.class.equals(o.getClass()) with o instanceof MyClass
rule.description: replace MyClass.class.equals(o.getClass()) with o instanceof MyClass. Make sure MyClass doesn't have descendants
